message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to potentially sell you this product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. To kick things off, I'm offering it to you for $14,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is quite high.  Could you consider $13,000? I'm confident you'll see a significant return on that investment.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $11,500. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,000?
